name: This Side Up (itch) (loopmari, DWalkerM, hawleych, Caiyin Liang, Suraj Karthikeyan)
name_original: This Side Up (itch) (loopmari, DWalkerM, hawleych, Caiyin Liang, Suraj Karthikeyan)
description:
You play as a ShredEx delieveryman, charged with dropping off as many packages as you possibly can in the allotted time. Unfortunately for your customers, the way ShredEx operates is a little… Different, to say the least. 

To impress your boss, you must damage the packages as much as you possibly can! Whether it’s smashing it up against walls, catching it on fire, dropping it off of towering buildings, letting it soak in puddles or electrify it with the conveniently placed electrical boxes, that’s up to you! Make every second count though, because it is a race against the cloak to get each perfectly mangled packages to the intended locations. 

With each package you drop off, the more you anger your customers, Hell hath no fury like a “Karen” scorned! These said “Karen’s” have made it their mission to make your job infinitely more difficult by stealing back the packages and running off with them, so be careful!  Each dropoff point will be marked by a glow whether it is at a door or window, you must drop the damaged loot off and then go pick up another back at your delivery truck and do it all again.

____________________
